topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5521ada963687240b20e1600#post_5521ada963687240b20e1600
Chose to stay on Yardack, rather then just learning instant transmission and using that to travel back and forth, Chose to stay dead for a really stupid reason, and instead of using his one day back on earth to visit his family he used it for his own amusement,

A poster i read once summed this up perfectly,

"It takes a boy to make a baby, But it takes a Man to raise one,"

Nothing Goku ever does can make me ignore his failures as a father, Not after Asura showed me what a real man is, Goku is a man child, to cought up in his own world to take care of the people he has the greatest responsibility to,
topics.author: 509f70a87f123b77eb0004fd

Also, I don't care about those other things since that isn't breaking character.
